name: Keurig
0:
”Alexa, ask Keurig to turn on my brewer”
”Alexa, ask Keurig to brew me an eight ounce cup of coffee”
”Alexa, ask Keurig what can you do?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: keurig
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Keurig® skill for Amazon Alexa, you can brew coffee by using simple voice commands.

Here are some things you can use Alexa for with your Keurig® brewer.

You can ask Alexa to turn your brewer on and off, and to brew your morning cup of hot coffee, tea, hot cocoa or iced coffee. You can even mention the size to brew 4, 6, 8, 10, or 12 ounces of your favorite beverage.

Just say something like "Alexa, ask Keurig to turn on my brewer”, or “Alexa, ask Keurig to brew me an eight ounce cup of coffee", or “Alexa, ask Keurig to brew over ice”.

You can also use routines in the Alexa app to power on your brewer and start brewing a cup of coffee before getting out of bed. For example, configure the routine and then say “Alexa, good morning".
